text: Pirates is a 1986 French-Tunisian adventure comedy movie directed by Roman Polanski and starring Walter Matthau, Charlotte Lewis, Roy Kinnear, Roger Ashton-Griffiths, Damien Thomas, Olu Jacobs, Ferdy Mayne. It was distributed by Cannon Films and was a box office bomb. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1987. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 comedy movies Category:1986 adventure movies Category:French comedy movies Category:French adventure movies Category:Tunisian movies Category:Pirate movies Category:Movies directed by Roman Polanski Category:Movies set in the 17th century Category:Movies set in Malta Category:Movies set in Tunisia
title: Pirates (1986 movie)
